name: Ham and Asparagus Bundles with Hollandaise Sauce
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Asparagus wrapped in ham and topped with hollandaise sauce is the perfect appetizer for any special occasion or meal.
ingredients: 1 (.9 ounce) package hollandaise sauce mix (such as Knorr®)
4 slices deli-style honey ham, sliced in half lengthwise
directions: Whisk sauce mix and milk together in a saucepan over medium-low heat
Bring to a boil, stirring until melted and smooth
Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until thick, about 1 minute
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook asparagus for 3 minutes
Drain and run under cold water to stop the cooking process
Transfer to a cutting board and pat dry with paper towels
Wrap a slice of ham around 4 asparagus spears and place on a serving tray
Repeat with remaining asparagus and ham
Drizzle hollandaise sauce over the asparagus bundles and garnish with dill
